definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: I see India from Lumbini Nepal to Sonauli India, thank you!
sentences.chinese: 我想从尼泊尔加德满都陆路去印度新德里，有班车吗？

sentences.english: This family of 12 decided to move to Kathmandu.
sentences.chinese: 准备搬迁到加德满都的12口之家。

sentences.english: Now in Nepal, this is in Katmandu, This is a market area on the street.
sentences.chinese: 现在是尼泊尔，这是加德满都，街道上有个十集市。

sentences.english: The pavilion will put on display the luster of Katmandu, the capital city of Nepal and an architectural, artistic and cultural center that has developed over 2,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 尼泊尔首都加德满都是一座“寺庙之城”。

definition: Lhasa, capital city of Tibet autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
Chiang Mai, second city of Thailand
Lumbini, Nepal, birthplace of Siddhartha Gautama 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2] founder of Buddhism (also written 嵐毘尼|岚毗尼[Lan2 pi2 ni2], 臘伐尼|腊伐尼[La4 fa2 ni2], 林微尼[Lin2 wei1 ni2])

pinyin: Ya4 di4 si1 Ya4 bei4 ba1

definition: Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
